CreateLibrary.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: smh.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLibrary
<公共请求参数>

    "BucketRegion": "ap-guangzhou",
    "Name": "名称",
    "Remark": "备注",
    "LibraryExtension": {
        "IsFileLibrary": "true"
    },
    "BucketName": "examplebucket-1250000000"
}

    "Remark": "新备注",

}
